estimatedDelivery.enabled.title: Enable
estimatedDelivery.enabled.description: Select if the checkout estimated delivery should be enabled.

estimatedDelivery.preferredSupplierEnabl.title: Enable Preferred Supplier Inventory
estimatedDelivery.preferredSupplierEnabl.description: Select if the checkout estimated delivery preferred supplier inventory should be included in express delivery estimates.

estimatedDelivery.poExpectedDateEnabled.title: Enable Expected Date for PO
estimatedDelivery.poExpectedDateEnabled.description: Select if the checkout estimated delivery PO expected date should be included in express delivery estimates.

estimatedDelivery.estimatedDaysForStanda.title: Estimated Days For Standard Delivery
estimatedDelivery.estimatedDaysForStanda.description: Enter the estimated days taken for standard delivery.

estimatedDelivery.deliveryCutoffTime.title: Delivery Cut-off Time
estimatedDelivery.deliveryCutoffTime.description: Select the hour of the day for the delivery cut-off time.

estimatedDelivery.warehouseMinStockLevel.title: Warehouse Minimum Stock Level
estimatedDelivery.warehouseMinStockLevel.description: Enter the minimum local warehouse inventory level allowed for items to be included in express delivery.

estimatedDelivery.supplierWarehouseMinSt.title: Supplier Minimum Stock Level
estimatedDelivery.supplierWarehouseMinSt.description: Enter the minimum supplier warehouse inventory level allowed for items to be included in express delivery.

estimatedDelivery.allCartItemsHaveSameEx.title: All Cart Have Same Express Delivery Date Message
estimatedDelivery.allCartItemsHaveSameEx.description: Enter the message to display above the user's shopping cart if all the items in their cart have the same express delivery date and all are in stock.
estimatedDelivery.allCartItemsHaveSameEx.default:
We love our environment ☺ To help reduce our carbon footprint, all items for your order are shipped together.

With our free standard delivery your order will arrive in 3-5 days. If you would like to receive $(0) upgrade for £1.99 at checkout.

estimatedDelivery.cartItemsHaveDifferent.title: Cart Have Different Express Delivery Date Message
estimatedDelivery.cartItemsHaveDifferent.description: Enter the message to display above the user's shopping cart if the items in their cart have different express delivery dates and all are in stock.
estimatedDelivery.cartItemsHaveDifferent.default:
We love our environment ☺ To help reduce our carbon footprint, all items for your order are shipped together.

With our free standard delivery your order will arrive in 3-5 days. If you would like to receive $(0) upgrade for £1.99 at checkout & remove non eligible items from cart below.

estimatedDelivery.someCartItemsOutOfStoc.title: Some Cart Items Out Of Stock Message
estimatedDelivery.someCartItemsOutOfStoc.description: Enter the message to display above the user's shopping cart if some the items in their cart are out of stock.
estimatedDelivery.someCartItemsOutOfStoc.default:
We love our environment ☺ To help reduce our Carbon footprint, all items for your order are shipped together.

Your order will be sent out as soon as your “Just sold out” product is back in stock. If you would like to receive $(0) upgrade for £1.99 at checkout & remove non eligible items from cart below.

estimatedDelivery.allCartItemsOutOfStock.title: All Cart Items Out Of Stock Message
estimatedDelivery.allCartItemsOutOfStock.description: Enter the message to display above the user's shopping cart if all the items in their cart are out of stock.
estimatedDelivery.allCartItemsOutOfStock.default:
We love our environment ☺ To help reduce our Carbon footprint, all items for your order are shipped together.

Your order will be sent out once your products are back in stock.

estimatedDelivery.shippingMethods.title: Shipping Methods
estimatedDelivery.shippingMethods.description: Estimated delivery settings for listed Shipping Methods

internalid.title: Internal ID
internalid.description: The Netsuite Internal ID of the Shipping Method.

title.title: Title
title.description: The title of the shipping method for admin reference only.

estimatedDeliveryInDays.title: Estimated Delivery
estimatedDeliveryInDays.description: The estimated number of days required for delivery.

inventoryLocation.title: Inventory Location
inventoryLocation.description: Select which inventory location all cart items must be fulfilled from.

saturdayShipping.title: Saturday Shipping
saturdayShipping.description: Tick this option to allow Saturday shipping for this shipping method.

priority.title: Priority
priority.description: The priority ranking used to order this shipping method in the list of available options. (Lower number = Higher rank)

inactive.title: Inactive
inactive.description: Tick this option to set the line inactive.

estimatedDelivery.suppliers.title: Suppliers
estimatedDelivery.suppliers.description: Estimated delivery settings for listed Suppliers

internalid.title: Internal ID
internalid.description: The Netsuite Internal ID of the Supplier.

title.title: Supplier Name
title.description: The supplier's name for admin reference only.

deliveryCutoffTime.title: Delivery Cut-off Time
deliveryCutoffTime.description: Select the hour of the day for the delivery cut-off time.

inactive.title: Inactive
inactive.description: Tick this option to set the line inactive.

estimatedDelivery.holidays.title: Holidays
estimatedDelivery.holidays.description: Dates regarded as non-working days for the estimated delivery.

title.title: Holiday Name
title.description: The holiday name for admin reference only.
